name: Drop - 3-speed all-over vibrator
about: What it is:A palm-size, all-over vibrator meant for versatile stimulation of erogenous zones..Highlighted Features:- 100 Percent Platinum-Grade Silicone:.This body-safe device is made from FDA-approved, medical-grade silicone...What Else You Need to Know:The soft-touch drop is made with 100 percent platinum-grade silicone (RoHs passed and FDA grade) and is a discreet, easy-to-use three-speed vibrator. Charged via USB, drop has a runtime of up to two-and-a-half hours, is water-resistant, and is phthalate- and latex-free.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Your vibe will arrive in travel mode. Simply hold the button for three seconds and wait for two quick, high-speed vibrations accompanied by two flashes of light. .-To exit travel mode, hold the button again for another three seconds. .-When charging, itu2019s recommended that you plug drop directly into a wall outlet with a USB adapter (versus plugging into a device's USB port, like a computer). .-The tip of the cable needs to be fully inserted for the vibe to charge. .-It takes two hours for the vibe to fully charge. .-The light should turn on when your vibe is charging and turn off when complete..-The vibe runs on a lithium-ion battery, so there will be battery drainage over time. .-Charge your vibe after every use for optimal life span. .-If the battery drains completely, the device will no longer work and cannot be charged.
